extension.summary: Zope Interface Lib repack for XBMC
extension.description: This package provides an implementation of "object interfaces" for Python. Interfaces are a mechanism for labeling objects as conforming to a given API or contract. So, this package can be considered as implementation of the 'Design By Contract' methodology support in Python.
